articles.title: New COVID Variant 'Eris' Spreading Rapidly In UK, Experts Sound Alarm - NDTV
articles.description: Eris or EG.5.1 was classified as a Covid variant on July 31 after UKHSA recorded its prevalence in the country due to rising cases internationally, particularly in Asia.
articles.content:
Eris is now the second most prevalent variant in the UK, after Arcturus
